page.title: 07 Local Events
page.content: This years Trinity Carnival was held on Saturday 22nd June at the Ninefoot Recreation Ground in Wilnecote. It started with a parade around the streets. There were many stalls and games . Among the attractions were a display of WWII events including a battle. There was also a Karate display and performances from local Jazz bands. Although the Carnival was very popular organisers said it could be the last beause of a lack of helpers. On the 8th May a march took place at Two Gates to commemorate V.E.day. The march started at 7:30pm. The Wilnecote branch of the Royal British Legion were there as well as the Brownies,the Red Cross and the Guides.
